meanings.definition: The knowledge or skill of a connoisseur.
meanings.sent1: Her connoisseurships in fine art were evident from the way she discussed paintings.
meanings.sent2: His connoisseurships in wine tasting made him a sought-after judge at competitions.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed its connoisseurships by only eating the most expensive brand of cat food.
meanings.sent4: His connoisseurships in music were like a compass guiding him to the most beautiful melodies.
meanings.sent5: Through years of practice, her connoisseurships in fashion became unmatched.

meanings.definition: The quality of being a connoisseur.
meanings.sent1: The connoisseurships of the sommelier were evident in the way he described the wine.
meanings.sent2: She possessed connoisseurships that set her apart from other collectors.
meanings.sent3: His connoisseurships in cheese tasting led to him being crowned the 'Cheese King'.
meanings.sent4: The connoisseurships of the detective in solving cases were legendary.
meanings.sent5: The connoisseurships of the chef were reflected in the exquisite flavors of the dish.

meanings.definition: The activities or interests of a connoisseur.
meanings.sent1: His connoisseurships included attending art auctions and visiting galleries.
meanings.sent2: She indulged in connoisseurships such as collecting rare stamps and coins.
meanings.sent3: The dog's connoisseurships in choosing toys were quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her connoisseurships in gardening were like a beautiful dance with nature.
meanings.sent5: The connoisseurships of the book club members extended to discussing literature in depth.
